Spinor2 Class

Extends Coords
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/Spinor2.ts:44
Module: math
Parent Module: EIGHT

Constructs a Spinor2 from a number[]. For a geometric implementation, use the static methods.

Constructor

()

reflect

(
  • n
)
Spinor2 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/Spinor2.ts:625

Sets this Spinor to the value of its reflection in the plane orthogonal to n. The geometric formula for bivector reflection is B' = n * B * n.

Parameters:

  • n VectorE2

Returns:

Spinor2:

this

() Spinor2 chainable
